How to Use Your Website to Leverage Your Business

 Nov 2, 2018

Nov 2, 2018

Welcome back to our webinar series on real estate fundamentals. For part nine of our series, I wanted to touch on one of the pieces of technology that is underutilized in many of our agentsâ businesses: websites.

In no way do I think itâs critical that our agents become web developers, but at the very least, they should know what the tools that are available to them can do to increase their business. Keller Williams invests $1 million per week in technology and that technology is available for us to use to leverage our businesses.

For your convenience, Iâve provided timestamps so that you can jump around to whatever part of the discussion interests you most:

2:20- A few helpful tips for getting started with setting up your own website through KW.

7:30- What setting up your own site outside of KW will cost you and why itâs silly to do so.

8:20- How to customize your domain.

10:45- How to add branding to your site and the benefits of doing so.

12:20- Launching your site and what a live website looks like from the front end.

13:30- How to update your âFeatured Listingsâ page on your site.

17:30- The two options for capturing leads through your site and the benefits and drawbacks of each.

19:30- How changing the overall look of your site through theme selection can help set you apart.

20:35- Tips for customizing the slideshow pictures that appear on your site.

22:30- How to integrate blogs and testimonials into your website.

25:00- A few additional tips and tricks to help you maximize the value of your site, including social media and KW app integration.

If you have any questions about your website or about anything else we touched on in this webinar, donât hesitate to give me a call or send me an email today. I look forward to hearing from you.
